description:
Non-material amendment to planning permission ref: P2017/3103/FUL, dated 12/09/2018, for the demolition of the existing buildings and erection of a 27-storey building (part 10, part 15, part 20, part 25, part 27-storeys) with 3 basement levels to provide for 63,507 square metres (GIA) of office floorspace (Use Class B1(a)) and 1,222 square metres (GIA) of flexible retail/professional services/restaurant/caf√© floorspace (Use Class A1/A2/A3) along with associated access and servicing arrangements, cycle parking, refuse storage and landscaping works.

The applicant seeks to amend Conditions 2 (Approved Drawings) and 42 (Approved Uses) to allow for an extension to the approved mezzanine.
decision_conditions: INFORMATIVE: To ensure non-visual cues are provided for people with anormal vision, the hereby approved mezzanine columns should feature a contrasting colour of a minimum of 30 LRV points between floor and column. A tactile element should also be provided on the floor surrounding the columns.
